column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I really don't understand the hype around this place. I live super close by
column2: and every weekend night there is a line out the door for these over priced noodles. Â I gave this place multiple shots
column3: but every time the ramen was just ok and the broth is very fatty. I've also ordered dumplings that were fine at best. It's super loud
column5: which detracts from the experience in my opinion. There are plenty of better ramen places in the area that are also cheaper.
